"
The D-arkers are trying to get away!
"
"We have to beat them before they run off!"
"...We'd better kill them before they run away."

"Well, now. They're running for their lives, aren't they?
Well, not that it'll do them any good."

"Tch. Now they're running away all of a sudden!
Hold 'yer horses! We're not letting you get away!"

"Hoo hoo hoo...It looks like my strength scared them off!
That's right, try to run away!"

"No, no. It's bad if they get away.
I keep reminding you, but this tournament is ranked by Score, okay?"
"I don't like hitting things in the back as they run. But I dislike losing games even more."

"
ダーカーが逃げ出そうとしている！
"
"逃げ切られる前に倒すぞ！"
"……逃げる前に仕留めないと。"

"あらあら、必死に逃げますねえ？
ま、無駄なんですけどねえ。"

"って、いきなり逃げ出しやがった！
待て待て、逃がすかっての！"

"ふふふ……あたしの力に
恐れをなしたとみえる！
そおら、逃げ惑えい！"

"いや、逃げられたらダメだからね。
何度も言うけどこれスコア勝負
なんだからね？"

"背中を狙うのは趣味じゃないけど
勝負事で負けるのはイヤなの。"
